name: 2048 Puzzle Game
description:
2048 Puzzle Game

Available on:

Simple and colorful number puzzle game.
Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile.
Swipe to move all tiles. When two tiles with the same number meet, they merge into one.

Features:

- Simple control.
- Fun and immersive.
- Access without internet connection.
- Colorful background
- Simple and high-quality graphics.
- Easy to play.
